entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Kestrel Metrics can crash local test run #57579
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #57578
  • Perf improvement: json #57577
  • Trace id confused with traceparent from http context in ProblemDetails Extensions? #57576
  • Regarding the Blazor <InputSelect> @bind-value and @onchange event handler #57575
  • Content Section content not rendered on client if you turn off pre-rendering of the Interactive Server page #57574
  • Missing IServiceProvider in ObjectGraphDataAnnotationsValidator #57573
    Backlog
  • Route constraints invoked for paths which do not use the route constraint #57572
  • Visual Studio 17.10.6 is causing runtime error - typeError: Promise constructor cannot be invoked without "new" #57571
  • Multiple Unhandled Exceptions thrown in statics.teams file #57569
  • Quarantine ProcessAsync_AwaitersUseTheResultOfExecutor #57567
  • Discrepancy between SignalRConnectionInfo & object that is needed for the @microsoft/signalr lib #57566
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.dll file version downgrade between 8.0.7 and 8.0.8 #57563
  • Processing errors adds duplicate error.type diagnostic tags to kestrel.connection.duration in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel #57558

Closed

  • Quarantine Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.EventTest.Cancel_CanTrigger #52783
    9.0-rc2
  • How to set prerender on all client WASM portion of a Blazor Web App #57532
  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETests.ServerRenderingTests.FormHandlingTests.FormWithParentBindingContextTest.EnhancedFormThatCallsNavigationManagerRefreshDoesNotPushHistoryEntry` #54757
    9.0-rc2
  • Perf improvement: caching, json_middleware, single_query #57549
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, fortunes_ef #57501
  • BlazorWebJsInitializersTest don't run #54367
    9.0-rc2
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #57550
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #57562
  • Regarding the Blazor <InputSelect> @bind-value and @onchange event handler #57570
  • [9.0.100-rc.2.24423.15] StaticWebAssets SDK - Conflicting assets in the same target path #57512
  • I would like to ask if I can provide a WPF blazor Webapp application template #57541
  • Perf regression: json, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #57543
  • [Blazor] Dynamically Load Library Like Mvc #57530
  • [Blazor] Improve StreamRender diffing and DOM change detection #57523

PullRequests

Created

  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI` package README #57580
    area-identity
  • Quarantine ProcessAsync_AwaitersUseTheResultOfExecutor #57568
    area-mvc
  • Feature/httpendpoint #57565
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix duplicate error.type on kestrel.connection.duration #57561
    area-networking
  • Verify project template dependencies #57560
    area-mvc
  • Update Router.cs #57559
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Unquarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.EventTest.Cancel_CanTrigger` #57555
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.EntityFramework` package README #57540
    area-networking, area-middleware, 10.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine EnhancedFormThatCallsNavigationManagerRefreshDoesNotPushHistoryEntry #57376
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix `InjectedStartup_DefaultApplicationNameIsEntryAssembly` #57554
    area-hosting, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix `BlazorWebJsInitializersTest` #57548
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Retry `ComponentLifecycleMethodThrowsExceptionTerminatesTheCircuit` #57552
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore` package README #57537
    area-identity
  • Fix typo in `RemoteUserAccount` triple slash #57443
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Invoke inbound activity handlers on circuit initialization #57557
    area-blazor
  • Http.Sys: Clean up Request parsing errors #57531
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 9.0-rc2
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Update C# code for #29448 #56086
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
